# [Interview #844: Toronto Signing Report - herid, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=844#3)

#### Brandon Sanderson

When asked if any of the Forsaken ever had any children he said MAFO.

#### herid

This pretty much means "no" IMO. So I'm afraid that does it for the nice theory that
[Taim is a son of Moridin and Narg](http://www.dragonmount.com/forums/topic/76196-crazy-theories/#entry2635381)
. :)
